# Badge
```import { Badge } from "@elevenia/master-ui/Components/Atom";```

Badges can be used as part of links or buttons to provide a counter.
Change **bg** value to change the color of a badge.

<Preview>
  <Story id="atom-badge--basic" />
</Preview>

## Stories
### Round Badge

Customize **round** value to change the border radius of a badge. 
You also can just add **round** without value to make a perfect pill badge.

<Preview>
  <Story id="atom-badge--round" />
</Preview>

### Custom Font Attribute

Add any of the below mentioned attribute to change the font attribute of a badge.

<Preview>
  <Story id="atom-badge--font-attribute" />
</Preview>
